pull.title: autoprune minor post-merge improvements
pull.body:
- Adds information about whether we are in pruned mode or not to RPC `getblockchaininfo()`.
- Produces appropriate response when trying to access a pruned block over REST and RPC.

events.body: Please don't extend getinfo. We want to deprecate it.

@sipa: right. You already told me that on IRC. My mistake, sorry.
Moved information to `getblockchaininfo()`.
Renamed and added some error handling for REST and RPC when trying to access a pruned block.
utACK after @sdaftuar 's nit fixed. The error message specifically mentions "pruned", so it should be sure that's actually the case.

Agreed with @sdaftuar.
Corrected prune mode test.

events.message: appropriate response when trying to get a block in pruned mode

comments.body: I think we're abolishing the name "autoprune". Can you just call it "pruned" or something?
